treatment.description: Leaves of offsets glabrous, papillose, or ciliate. Cymes: primary branches simple, rarely dichotomously forked, 2–4(–8) cm. Flowers: petals yellow, 5–10 mm; anthers yellow; nectar scales 0.4–0.5 mm.
treatment.habitat: Sandy loam, gravel slopes, rocky slopes and crevices, open areas or partial shade
